sections.text: GTO may refer to:

• A gate turn-off thyristor, a type of semiconductor device
  • Geostationary transfer orbit, an intermediate orbit around the Earth
  • Golgi tendon organ, a proprioceptive sensory receptor organ
  • Gaussian-type orbital, a function use to represent and atomic orbital

• The station code of Gorton railway station in Greater Manchester, England
  • Grand Touring Over, an International Motor Sports Association category for production cars
  • Gran Turismo Omologato (Italian for 'Grand Touring Homologated'), a model name used on several grand tourer automobiles:
    • Ferrari 250 GTO
    • Ferrari 288 GTO
    • Ferrari 599 GTO
    • Pontiac GTO
    • Mitsubishi Galant GTO
    • Mitsubishi GTO

• GameTable Online, a website featuring online adaptations of many popular board and card games
  • Great Teacher Onizuka, the manga, anime, live-action, and movie
  • G.T.O., debut song of Ronny & the Daytonas
  • The GTOs (Girls Together Outrageously), a late 1960s "band" closely associated with Frank Zappa and featuring Pamela Des Barres
  • Greater Than One, a techno husband and wife band formed in 1985
  • "G.T.O.", a 1987 single by Sinitta
  • GTO Records, a UK record label
  • GTO (band), an Australian band

• Geographic targeting order, an order issued by the United States Secretary of Treasury
  • Ready for Labour and Defence of the USSR, the Soviet physical culture training programme
